channel.title: Oregon-Washington Highway on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Oregon-Washington Highway on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: OR-11 North at Stateline Road - Leaving Oregon
item.description: OR-11 North at Stateline Road in Umatilla County. Stateline Road parallels the Oregon-Washington border. Oregon Thanks You - Come Back Soon.

item.title: OR-11 North at OR-332 West (Sunnyside Road)
item.description: OR-11 North at OR-332 West (Sunnyside Road) in Umatilla County.

item.title: OR-11 North (Main St.) at Columbia St.
item.description: OR-11 North (Main St.) at Columbia St. Turn right on Columbia St. to continue north on OR-11 to Walla Walla (WA) and Spokane (WA). Continue straight on Main St. for Old Town Freewater.

item.title: OR-11 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on OR-11 north. Distance to Milton-Freewater and Walla Walla (Washington).

item.title: OR-11 North Approaching OR-204
item.description: OR-11 North Approaching OR-204 east to Weston and Elgin.

item.title: End OR-331 North at OR-11
item.description: End OR-331 North at OR-11 in Umatilla County. Turn right for OR-11 north to Milton-Freewater; turn left for OR-11 south to Pendleton.

item.title: OR-11 South at OR-331
item.description: OR-11 South at OR-331 (unsigned). Use OR-331 south (Mission Highway) to Mission and LaGrande. All I-84 truck traffic use OR-331.

item.title: OR-11 South Approaching OR-331
item.description: OR-11 South Approaching OR-331 (Mission Highway). Use Mission Highway for Mission and LaGrande. I-84 traffic is encouraged to use the Mission Highway instead of going through Pendleton.

item.title: OR-11 South Approaching Adams Jct.
item.description: OR-11 South approaching Adams Jct.

item.title: OR-11 South Approaching OR-334 and Banister Road
item.description: OR-11 South approaching (OR-334) west to Athena, and Banister Road east to Weston.

item.title: OR-11 South Approaching Athena Jct.
item.description: OR-11 South Approaching Athena Jct (unsigned OR-334).

item.title: OR-11 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on OR-11 south. Distance to Weston and Pendleton.

item.title: OR-11 South at OR-332
item.description: OR-11 south at OR-332 west in Umatilla County.

item.title: OR-11 South Approaching OR-332
item.description: OR-11 South approaching OR-332 in Umatilla County. OR-332 was recently signed as a state highway. In prior years this was just known as the Sunnyside-Umapine Highway #332, but without any route markers.

item.title: OR-11 South Approaching OR-332
item.description: OR-11 South approaching OR-332 to Sunnyside and Umapine.

item.title: OR-11 South - Welcome To Oregon
item.description: Welcome to Oregon on OR-11 south at the Washington-Oregon state line. Also the first speed limit sign in Oregon is in the background - 55 MPH. Most Oregon speed limit signs omit the word Limit.

item.title: US-30 West/OR-11 South at US-30/OR-11 Split
item.description: US-30 West/OR-11 South at US-30/OR-11 Split in Pendleton. Turn left for OR-11 south to I-84/US-395 to Portland and La Grande. Continue straight for US-30 West to City Center.

item.title: US-30 West/OR-11 South - I-84 West Next Left
item.description: US-30 West/OR-11 South approaching US-30/OR-11 Split in Pendleton. Turn left for I-84 West to Portland.

item.title: US-30 West/OR-11 South (Court St.) at US-30/OR-11 Split
item.description: US-30 West/OR-11 South (Court St.) at US-30/OR-11 split in Pendleton.

item.title: US-30 West at OR-11
item.description: US-30 West at OR-11. Use OR-11 north for Milton-Freewater and Walla Walla (Washington). Continue west on US-30 for City Center and Information Center. OR-11 south joins US-30 west for a short distance through Pendleton.

item.title: US-30 West Approaching OR-11
item.description: US-30 West approaching OR-11 North in Pendleton.

item.title: Begin OR-11 North at I-84
item.description: Begin OR-11 north at I-84 onramp. Turn right for I-84 east to La Grande; continue straight for OR-11 north to City Center (Pendleton) and for I-84 west onramp to Portland.

item.title: I-84 East Exit 210 Offramp at OR-11
item.description: I-84 East Exit 210 Offramp at OR-11 junction. Turn left for OR-11 north to City Center (Pendleton) and Milton-Freewater. Turn right for ODOT office.

item.title: I-84 East Exit 210 Offramp at OR-11
item.description: I-84 East Exit 210 Offramp at OR-11 junction. Turn left for OR-11 north to City Center (Pendleton) and Milton-Freewater. Turn right for ODOT office.

item.title: OR-11 South at OR-204
item.description: OR-11 South at OR-204 interchange. Use OR-204 east for Weston and Elgin.

item.title: OR-11 South Approaching OR-204
item.description: OR-11 South approaching OR-204. Use OR-204 east for Tollgate and Spout Springs.

item.title: OR-11 South Approaching OR-204
item.description: OR-11 South approaching OR-204. Use OR-204 east for Weston and Elgin.

item.title: OR-11 - Milton-Freewater
item.description: Columbia St. south approaching Main St. in Milton-Freewater. OR-11 turns left onto S. Main St. towards Pendleton.

item.title: OR-11 South at Sunnyside Road
item.description: OR-11 south at Sunnyside Road. Turn right on Sunnyside Road for Sunnyside and Umapine.

item.title: OR-11 South - Welcome To Oregon
item.description: Welcome to Oregon on OR-11 south at the Washington-Oregon state line. Also the first speed limit sign in Oregon is in the background - 55 MPH. Most Oregon speed limit signs omit the word Limit.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 210
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 210 - OR-11/Pendleton/Milton-Freewater.

item.title: US-30 East at OR-11 (To I-84)
item.description: US-30 east at OR-11. Turn right for OR-11 south to I-84, and Portland. Continue straight for US-30 East/OR-11 North/To I-84 East/Milton Freewater/Walla Walla.

item.title: US-30 East Approaching OR-11
item.description: US-30 east approaching OR-11. Use OR-11 south to I-84 West/Portland.

item.title: I-84 West Exit 210
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 210, Pendleton.
